content: Any idea when a release would get pushed out that fixes some if the IG Automation related issues I reported?
SUSHI 0.11.1 was just released! Any issue that you had put on GitHub that we completed and closed recently should be fixed in that.
As for the integration w/ the publisher, I believe that Grahame is working on that now...
@Chris Moesel is there a standard release cadence for SUSHI?

Hi @Matt Rouhana. At this point SUSHI is feature complete for the soon-to-be published FSH 2.0, so we don't have a standard release cadence right now. We're currently doing bug fixes and minor improvements, so we generally release after collecting a chunk of these. Is there a specific fix or feature you are waiting on?
@Chris Moesel - I'm trying to define a Mapping from a Logical, which is fixed in SUSHI#946. That pull was merged, so I'm just waiting on the next release.

OK. In that case, I think we can get a release out this week. Maybe even tomorrow. We have two open pull requests that I'd like to see if we can fit in before the release. But if it looks like they'll be a while, we'll cut a release without them.
Hi @Matt Rouhana. SUSHI 2.2.0 was just released.
